string.value: I better talk to #p9105002# again and hear more about the event.

#p9105002# explained to me in greater detail about the event that's taking place. It looks like I'll need to gather some #t4032056#s, bring them all to #p9105002#, and receive a special prize in return.

I gave #p9105002# some #t4032056#, and she gave me a present in return. I guess I can only enter this event once a day. Seriously, is there no way I can enter again today? Perhaps I could find a ticket elsewhere...
That ticket is to enter the area where the Secret Event is being held.

Joining this event is easy! Do you remember the #bMini Dungeons#k that are located all over the world of Maple? Use the ticket I just gave you and enter one of the dungeon maps. Once you use the portal inside, you'll be able to move to a special Mini Dungeon that is slightly different from the ones you've been used to.
Ah, the dungeon will look the same on the outside. The big change is the item the monsters drop. One of the items they'll drop will actually be #bThe Secret Something#k.

The #bSecret Something#k......that something is actually a crystal called #b#t4032056##k. I want you to gather up as many of those as you can, and then come back to me. Depending on how much you bring, I'll give you a special, special reward that you'll surely love!

Oh, and while setting up this event, I have changed the Mini Dungeon settings a bit. Please take note of the following: 
1, Once you enter the dungeon, you can only be inside for 5 minutes. After that, you'll be automatically removed from the dungeon.
2,You may enter the Mini Dungeon up to 6 times per day.
3, You can't enter the dungeon if you are affiliated with a party at the time of entrance.
4, You cannot use special skills once inside the dungeon.
For Skill Books and Mastery Books, please check the event page of the website for details!

These prizes are based on the number of #t4032056#s you own, so please check your inventory first before coming to me. You can have as many #t4032056#s as you want, so gather them up as many as you can until you reach the target number you need to earn that special prize.
Now, what are you doing just standing here? Go get some crystals!! I'll be here waiting!

"What? You want to know what you can receive by trading in #b#t4032056##k? Hmmm... this information is supposed to be a top secret... but I'll give you the list JUST FOR YOU! I'm only going to say this once, so remember it, write it down, do something! Here are the prizes. 

100 : Change to Mouse(10) 

200 : Power Elixir(20) 

500 : Energy Drink(10) 

700 : Necomimi(1) 

1000 : Summoning Superslime(1) 

1500 : Moon Star Chair(1) 

2000 : Under the Maple Tree(1) 

2500 : Sword Earrings or Shield Earrings(1)
You're back! How many did you wind up gathering? Are you interested in trading them in for a prize right now?
Alright, now based on how many #b#t4032056#s#k you have, you'll be receiving this. I'll give out 1 free event ticket per day, so I'll be expecting to see you here tomorrow!

What? You want to join this event again today? Well... if you really insist, we sell the special tickets that'll allow you to participate in this event more than once in one day! You can find them at the Cash Shop, so... good luck!
Oh I see. Please let me know when you are ready to make the exchange!
Oh no, you don't have enough #t4032056# yet? Take the Event Ticket and enter the dungeon to gather them up by defeating the monsters. Good luck!!
